text: I'm the founder of katoa and what we're

realized somewhere between a platform

we're in a space right now that there's
tons of different options in the cloud

many to choose so what we've done is
we've done in an opinion approach where
we can choose different types of things
such as kubernetes or such as Argo

fourth company this is the first time

Hong Kong is interesting because it's
